ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: the early problem that took long to fix was proc ing weapons sticking our songs.  the later problem that was resolved much faster (within 1 patch) was where a
ygData.messageBody:
the early problem that took long to fix was proc'ing weapons sticking our
songs. the later problem that was resolved much faster (within 1 patch) was
where a proc'ing weapon would not proc while singing a song.

Shada

> Hmm. The only issue I remember with bard weapon procs was when the
> weapon proc'ing would lock up your songs so you had to camp or zone to
> clear it. (actually it was discovered rapidly clicking your hotkeys
> would fix it but very few seemed to know about that trick)
>
> That didn't get fixed for a couple of months after I first ran across
> it.
